item.title: Help with code string
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

i think its 2 make your charecter run or walk but not 100% sure try it

Completely wrong… All it is, is a test class, it cycles through 3 cases, and prints in the cmd what stage its at and if it was successful. It has no other function.

item.title: Help with code string
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_ur_mom k0ed ur mom
item.description:
@k0ed_ur_mom wrote:

Need help with this code please can’t figure out what’s wrong with it

public class test {

public void runTest(){
int tests = 0;
boolean canRun = false;
int try = 0;

	while (tests <= 3 && tests >= 0){
		if(canRun == true){
			switch(tests){
				case 0:
					System.out.print("Case ");
					System.out.println(tests);
					tests++;
					break;
				case 1:
					System.out.print("Case ");
					System.out.println(tests);
					tests++;
					break;
				case 2:
					System.out.print("Case ");
					System.out.println(tests);
					tests++;
					break;
			}
		} else {
			if(try == 2){
					System.out.println("Enabled running.");
					canRun = true;
			} else {
					System.out.println("Failed to enable running, trying again.");
					try++;
			}
			}
	} 
}

}

Read full topic
